message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $130. It's in excellent condition and worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the condition of the product, but I can only pay up to $110. Looking forward to your response!
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $110 is a little too low for me. I'm willing to go down to $120. This is a great deal for you and a fair price for me. Let's make this happen!
